SubIntro1: You need 2 items in order to subscribe to the Belgian Chess Championships:
SubIntro2: Your id number of the Royal Belgian Chess Federation
SubIntro4: In case you do not have your id number of the RBCF, please contant your chess club, which can provide it.
SubIntro5: In case your club just requested a new id number, please take into account it can take a few days before the id number is published.
SubId1: Please provide your id number of the RBCF
SubId2: The id number could not be found
SubId3: Please take into account that a takes a few days before a newly requested id-number is available.
SubId4: The id number is not belonging to a youth player
SubPhoto1: We need a photo to make your tournament badge. You need to select a photo by dragging a photo to the photo area or by either clicking the photo area and selecting a photo.
SubPhoto2: Photo area . Drop your photo here or click to select a photo
SubPhoto3: Once the photo is selected, you can move the selector handles with your mouse in order to adjust the photo.  Please make sure that the face of player fills the resulting image. When the resulting image seems OK, click continue.
UnknownError: An unknown error occured.  Please try again. If the error persists, please contact the organizers
A parent is present at site: A parent is present at site
Info about adult representative at site: Info about adult representative at site
SubConf1: The subscription fee is 35 Euro if you pay before the 1st of March 2019.  After that date you wil have to pay 45 Euro.
SubConf2: Pay the amount on account BE33 0017 5924 5146 with the structered message:
SubNat1: For the FIDE you are a Belgian. This means you can win the Balgian title and you can participate to the European and World Championships as part of the Belgian team.
SubNat10: In any case Bycco will not leak any personal information to third parties.
SubNat2: For the FIDE you are not a Belgian. This means you cannot win the Belgian title and you cannot participate to the European and World Championships as part of the Belgian team.
SubNat3: You are not affiliated to the FIDE. Unless you contact us before the 15th of March and instruct us to explicitely do otherwise, we will affiliate you as a Belgian to the FIDE, so you can win the Belgian title and you can participate to the European and World Championships as part of the Belgian team.
SubNat4: You give Bycco to right to use the personal data collected in this subscription form.
SubNat5: Bycco will only use this data in order to organize this championships.
SubNat6: Bycco will use the profile picture for a badge and for identification on the website.
SubNat7: Bycco will use all personal data like telephone numbers and email addresses for internal purposes only.
SubNat8: Bycoo is taking overview photos/videos of the championships and can publish these photos/videos on its website and on social media
SubNat9: If Bycco is taking a closeup photos/video of a player, Bycco will explicitely ask permission to publish.
